channel.title: Lesbian Babies?
channel.description:
Women might soon be able to produce sperm in a development that could allow lesbian couples to have their own biological daughters, according to a pioneering study published today.
http://news.independent.co.uk/world/science_technology/article2444462.ece Great. Just what we need in the world. More fucking people.

item.title: Lesbian Babies?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

apzrman:

yeah, but if it’s 2 female DNA, how will they make a boy?

Creating sperm from women would mean they would only be able to produce daughters because the Y chromosome of male sperm would still be needed to produce sons. The latest research brings the prospect of female-only conception a step closer

Read full topic

item.title: Lesbian Babies?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“juju, post:33, topic:79214”][quote author=happy_world link=topic=116441.msg1160439#msg1160439 date=1176644797]
to do cloning you still need the male sperms[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 02:44:55 AM[/size][hr]so what ever you do you still need a male
[/quote]

No. They take DNA from a single cell and place it into a female egg which has had it’s nucleus removed, they then implant the cell into a female’s uterus, and thus, asexual reporduction occurs and the resulting offspring has the exact genetic material as the mother. If it required male sperm and female eggs then it wouldn’t be a ‘clone’…[/quote]

that was utter bs mate. read a text book.

Read full topic

item.title: Lesbian Babies?
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

happy_world:

to do cloning you still need the male sperms[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 02:44:55 AM[/size][hr]so what ever you do you still need a male

No. They take DNA from a single cell and place it into a female egg which has had it’s nucleus removed, they then implant the cell into a female’s uterus, and thus, asexual reporduction occurs and the resulting offspring has the exact genetic material as the mother. If it required male sperm and female eggs then it wouldn’t be a ‘clone’…

Read full topic
